description:
We will be seeing on our television screens when the The Walking Dead spin-off bows on AMC sometime in 2015.我们将会在2015年在电视上看到AMC电视台推出的《行尸走肉》衍生剧。

TWD creator Robert Kirkman, who will also executive produce the currently untitled spin-off, has made it clear that the companion show will have virtually no ties to the original show, other than the fact that they will both take place in the midst of the zombie apocalypse. Robert previously told Vulture, “I can say we’re not going to pull any characters from The Walking Dead, or the comics. It will be an all-new cast and an entirely new setting.”《行尸走肉》制作人兼执行制片人Robert Kirkman最近透露了部分关于该剧的细节，他表示这部衍生剧几乎不会和原剧有任何关系，如果一定要说联系的话，应该就是两部剧都是讲述丧尸爆发时期的故事。Robert之前接受采访时说，”我可以很肯定的说，我们不会使用《行尸走肉》的任何演员或者是漫画原著的剧情。这将会是一部全新设定、全新演员班子的新剧。

But that doesn’t mean it won’t kick ass. In fact, Robert says the companion show could end up being better than TWD all together!虽然和《行尸走肉》原剧关系不大，但这不会影响这部衍生剧成为一部好剧。事实上，Robert表示这部衍生剧会比《行尸走肉》好看得多！

“We’re all working behind the scenes right now to make sure it’s as awesome as it possibly can be,” he said back in October. “I think it may actually end up being more awesome than the original show.”“为了让这部剧真正的能够开拍，我们正在做幕后筹备工作，”他今年10月的时候曾经说。“我觉得这部剧最后出来的效果可能会比原剧好看的多。”
